attributes.action: Answer questions to him at PMQ's directly...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prime Ministers Questions are an important part of weekly politics.  However this prime minister and previous prime ministers simply do not answer questions given to them...when asked a 'Yes' or 'No' question they answer with another question.  When answering a questions they simply talk about the past and what the Tories have failed on in the past.  We must look to the future and answer questions to allow the public to see how the government will deal with future issues and not to continuously look back to the past...

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
